name: 2D Platformer - Coursera Course
description:
The modifications are as follows:
1) 2 unique levels have been added to the game.

2) A new type of enemy, that shoots, has been created.

3) A "Teleporter" has been added randomly into levels. It is an interactable item that teleports the player to random locations in the level once the player comes in contact with it. It can also send the player to their own death by teleporting them to acid!

4) Lastly, a dialogue of 2 lines has been added at the beginning of the second level
